reviewComments: On my August 2015 visit to Gus's, the jerky was from an outfit in Washington state. It was good. But, not as good as what Gus's has sold in the past under his own brand.
Gus's Fresh Jerky.knownFor: “ Awesome jerky ” Reviewed February 3, 2013 via mobile We were on vacation and driving from vegas to san diego via mohave preserve. My gf who loves jerky saw this place... So we stopped to have a look. Since my gf is not a lover of red meat she found some turkey jerky. After spending 50$ i have to say... Its the best jerky ever. Its worth the stop... More Helpful? 2 Thank Gerald M Report
